about_the_game:
*Bzzt...* This is Lisa, with Michael and the others. We're trapped inside Inn 8. It's 2 AM... our phones, our cameras—they're almost dead. *Bzzt...* Don't come into Inn 8! If you see this, run! Call the police to save us, if we're still alive... Something's wrong here... I saw... Oh no, Michael! *Click*

Today is a perfect day for a walk in the forest, and maybe take a few beautiful photos. But be careful and don't enter strange buildings! There's a rumor about an inn 8 in the forest with maddening magic. Once you enter, there's no way out—former guests either died or went mad. No one knows what they saw or experienced inside. Will you be the one to break the curse and survive?

  • Delve deep into the woods and explore the forsaken inn.

  • Make a deal with the devil, suffer eternal damnation.

  • Endless rooms—where is the end?

  • Utilize unique game mechanics to solve puzzles skillfully.

This game is created by @AMIN with YAHAHA Horror Game Kit and YAHAHA assists the creator with packaging and publishing the game based on their request. Yahaha Horror Gamekit is tailored for imaginative creators and players who adore horror games, all without the need for any programming expertise.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

name: Inn 8

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Inn 8 is a first-person horror adventure game with unique gameplay mechanics. Stumbled upon a cursed inn while taking a selfie in the wild. Endless rooms and terrifying monsters await. Use your wits to uncover the house's evil secrets, defeat your enemies and break the curse.
